title: Adding Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
description: When trying to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does nothing. The expected behavior would be for the action to add the Javadoc on the selected field.
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu, nothing happens.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' option in the context menu should add the Javadoc on the selected field in the Type Hierarchy view.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view
2. Select a field in the view
3. Right-click on the selected field
4. From the context menu, choose 'Add Javadoc'
